Package sportstournament.main

Class Athlete

java.lang.Object
sportstournament.main.Athlete
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
public class Athlete extends Object implements Purchasable
This class implements an Athlete which has different statistics (offence, defence, stamina), a nickname, an injury status, and a price. The price of an athlete is determined by the average of their stats and scaled down by a factor of 10. An athlete becomes injured when their stamina reaches 0 and can no longer perform in matches. The position they play is determined by their index in the active team. This class also contains a random Athlete generator which gives an athlete a random name and stats.
Author:
Isaac Steele and Reuben Schoonbee

    • randomAthleteGenerator

      public static Athlete randomAthleteGenerator()
      Random Athlete Generator
      Returns:
      Returns a random athlete with their stats between 50 and 100 and a name randomly selected from a default list of names.

    • randomAthleteGenerator

      public static Athlete randomAthleteGenerator(int randomDefence, int randomOffence)
      Random Athlete Generator based on the number of weeks remaining
      Parameters:
      randomDefence - A randomly generated defence stat based on the weeks remaining and total weeks
      randomOffence - A randomly generated offence stat based on the weeks remaining and total weeks
      Returns:
      Returns a random athlete with stats generated based on the total number of weeks and weeks remaining. This method is called through the Team class.
